A '''Lannister captain''' is an unnamed recurring character in the [[Season 2|second season]]. He is played by guest star [[Aiden Condron]] and debuts in "[[The Old Gods and the New]]." He is stationed at [[Harrenhal]] during the [[War of the Five Kings]].
sections.Biography:
===[[Season 2]]===
He announces the arrival of Lord [[Petyr Baelish]] to Lord [[Tywin Lannister]] at [[Harrenhal]].<ref>"[[The Old Gods and the New]]"</ref> When Tywin marches from Harrenhal he orders [[Rorge]] and [[Biter]] to fall in.<ref>"[[The Prince of Winterfell]]"</ref>
